source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!
Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 3,332 Agility and lose 310 Mastery for 12 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Grasps of Awakened Fury

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Offer to bind your spirit with that of another player also wearing this ring. This binding is permanent, but can be severed at the cost of 1 Blasphemite. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to empower each unique gem color of an ally's socketed gems. This boon grants 391 to each empowered secondary stat for 15 sec. This effect will always target your bonded ally, if able.

Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,764 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 1.1 million Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,557 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Court of Harvesters Tabard
